newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list options on three stocks on Sept 26.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list options on three stocks on Sept 26.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange said on Wednesday it would list options on Brite Voice Systems Inc, DII Group Inc and Software 2000 Inc on September 26.
The exchange said Brite Voice would have strike prices of 10, 12-1/2 and 15 and expiration months of October, November, December and March.
Brite Voice ended at 12-1/16 on Wednesday.
Highland Securities Co will be the specialist unit, the Amex said.
For DII Group, opening strikes will be at 17-1/2, 20 and 22-1/2. Expiration months will be October, November, December and March. AGS Specialist Partners will be the specialists.
DII shares ended at 20-3/4 on Wednesday.
The AMEX said Software 2000 will have opening strikes of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2. The stock ended at 9-5/8.
Initial expiration months will be October, November, February and May.
Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist unit.
